section_about.title: We are the IT Partner that will Boost your Business
section_about.content: Focused on results, we use our IT experience together with the latest technology available in the market to guide you in the digital transformation of your company.

section_features.title: Technology
section_features.content_1: The designs are adjustable to the different devices on the market (Pc, Laptop, Tablets, Telephones)
section_features.content_2: Bootstrap is an open source toolkit for responsive web development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
section_features.content_3: These are some of the technologies we use for both Websites and App Development.
section_features.content_4: We use WooCommerce for your Store, together with WordPress it is the most used in the world of e-commerce.
section_features.content_5: We develop Portable Web Apps, simple to install in Cloud services.
section_features.content_6: We make available to our clients a Ticket System for Feedback during the Development of Solutions.

section_faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section_faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions from our clients.

faq1.question: Why does my business need a website?
faq1.answer: Today, 85% of consumers research online before buying a product or hiring a service. A professional website builds credibility.

faq2.question: How much does it cost to develop a website?
faq2.answer: The cost depends on your needs, but we offer flexible plans tailored to your requirements. Whether you need a basic site or a custom solution, we’ll work within your budget.

faq3.question: I don’t know how to register a .com domain. Can you help?
faq3.answer: Absolutely! We handle .com  domain registration for you. Once completed, we’ll transfer full ownership and management rights to you.

faq4.question: If I don’t have hosting, does Adhentux provide this service?
faq4.answer: Yes! We offer secure, reliable web hosting with regular backups and continuous security updates. Our support ensures your site stays 100% online, 365 days a year.

faq5.question: How do I handle the website content?
faq5.answer: We’ll guide you! Based on your business profile and products/services, we help you define, organize, and optimize content to attract your ideal customers.

faq6.question: Will the website look good on all devices?
faq6.answer: Definitely! Our designs are fully responsive, meaning they adapt seamlessly to smartphones, tablets, and desktops—no extra effort required.
